items.sentence: Tom arrived in Australia three weeks after Mary.
Tom was just one of the people that I talked to.
I waited for Tom all morning, but he never came.
Many flights were canceled because of the storm.
I know who Tom is, but I've never spoken to him.
Turtles have a lifespan of 10 to over 100 years.
Tom put his dirty clothes in the laundry basket.
We suffer from an incurable disease called hope.
More than one thing can be bad at the same time.
Tom arrived much earlier than I expected him to.
I haven't seen Tom in a little over three years.
Tom was able to convince Mary to come back home.
Tom was with us the last time we came to Boston.
Tom was the one who told me we ought to do that.
I didn't think that Tom could understand French.
Tom thought that Mary would know where John was.
Tom was willing to do what Mary asked him to do.
Tom was the only one who didn't know what to do.
Tom was surprised by what he read in the report.
Tom was telling the truth about where he'd been.
Tom was allowed to tell Mary everything he knew.
Tom isn't getting worried. He's already worried.
Tom was much better at doing that than Mary was.
Tom walked into the room, looking very handsome.
Please take these dirty dishes into the kitchen.
Why should I help Tom when he's never helped me?
Tom didn't open the window like we asked him to.
That was the first time I ever tried doing that.
Tom needs to be here again tomorrow, doesn't he?
If there's any way I can help, just let me know.
I suggest that you park over there in the shade.
It is a fact that smoking is a danger to health.
Never put off to tomorrow what you can do today.
It's not necessary to write more than 400 words.
That cake looks good too. Give me a small piece.
Breakfast is the most important meal of the day.
I can't understand why Tom turned down that job.
It wasn't as difficult as I thought it would be.
There should be a convenience store around here.
Tom didn't like any of the songs that Mary sang.
The post office is about five minutes from here.
Why do you think it was Tom who stole your oboe?
You need to wear a helmet when riding a bicycle.
Tom is usually the last person to finish eating.
Tom wasn't shocked by what Mary suggested he do.
Tom wasn't the one who gave Mary her first kiss.
Tom will likely be very tired when he gets home.
Tom has been sentenced to one year of probation.
Tom won't be the first person to enter the cave.
Tom won't be the only one sitting on the ground.
